Imagine getting to spend the day at a spa. Now imagine feeling that comfortable and relaxed every night in your bed. I’m going to help you put together the most comfortable bed you can imagine, for the most luxurious sleep of your life!
You’re going to need a mattress and base set that will support your body according to your sleep position. You’ll also need the perfect pillow. Click here one of my previous posts will help you find your perfect match.
Pro tip: If you aren’t able to afford a new mattress right now, a smart way to increase the comfort of your current mattress is to add a padded layer on top, like the Parma mattress topper.
Click here to view our range of mattress and base sets
Next, you’ll need a sheet set in the fabric that suits you best. I personally recommend cotton Paquita sheets for allergy-sufferers, polycotton Kelly sheets for keeping your body temperature stable, microfibre polyester Ronda sheets for its softness on sensitive skin and polar fleece Fay sheets for the ultimate winter warmth. Click on each of fabrics listed above to see which sheet sets I recommend from the HomeChoice collection.
Click here to view our full range of sheet sets
If you prefer a duvet to a comforter, you’ll need to choose which type of filler you prefer. Our most luxurious options include the traditional Sutton feather duvet inner and its allergy-friendly alternative with a sophisticated synthetic filler, Royal Danish Sheradown.
Pro tip: Believe it or not, there is a duvet inner that’s adjustable for cooler and warmer weather. Don’t believe me? Click here to see this clever innovation for yourself.
Click here to view our full range of duvet inners and pillows
Because this is your sleep sanctuary, it’s important to choose the bedding design that perfectly suits your taste and personality. Thankfully, we have many options for you to choose from and I’m confident you’ll find the perfect one right here.
Pro tip: Our bedding sets come with matching curtains, continental pillowcases and more if you choose luxury and super luxury options, so you can have a perfectly coordinated look with lots of pillows to sink into – bliss!
Click here to view our full range of bedding sets
A HomeChoice blanket is the softest, warmest item you could ever want to sleep under and its comfortable weight feels a lot like a hug. No sleep sanctuary is complete without this level of comfort which is why I left it til last. Click here to see my favourite mink blanket.
Pro tip: It’s a good idea to get a thick mink blanket and a thinner one because although the thicker ones are so luxurious, they can be a bit too toasty at times.
Click here to view our full range of blankets
Now that you have an idea of the sleep sanctuary you deserve, creating one for yourself is going to be almost as enjoyable as sleeping in it! Explore all the possibilities for your sleep sanctuary, right here.
DUDU DLAMINI
The HomeChoice Sleep Expert
Dudu works for HomeChoice helping select the products to enhance our customers’ sleep. As a mother of active twin boys, she is passionate about getting a good night’s rest and firmly believes in the restorative benefits of 8 hours of comfortable, uninterrupted sleep.
